Oh so you want it to change during training, right? Well you can still do it via a subclass by just adding an extra method on it to update. However, you should pay attention to only use num_workers=0.

Considering that samplers are designed to work with multiprocessing data loading, I don't think this is very doable generally.

body:
Oh so you want it to change during training, right? Well you can still do it via a subclass by just adding an extra method on it to update. However, you should pay attention to only use `num_workers=0`.

Considering that samplers are designed to work with multiprocessing data loading, I don't think this is very doable generally.
